comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
In the left lower corner the date scratched is 3/9/29 (mirror view), March 9th, 1929.  Several pictures were dated the same day, 18 (eighteen) years later  the real events took place, for example the photo entitled Federal Troops at Torreón; pending to tell you wich other photos of your collection have scratched 1929 date.
 Dr. Roberto Duarte
